sources.name: DelimitedText1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DelimitedText1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DelimitedText1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://njlabfiles.blob.core.windows.net/babs/data/201508_station_data.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DelimitedText1,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"dockcount", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Changed column type", each [dockcount] > 12),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Filtered rows", {"landmark"}, {{"Count", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}, {"total_dockcount", each List.Sum([dockcount]), type nullable number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";
